keyword: calories on in and out burger
title: Calories in In-N-Out Burger
meta_description: Learn calories in In-N-Out burger with full nutrition facts including protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and tweaks for variations like cheese or double patties.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out Hamburger: 100% beef patty (2 oz), toasted bun, signature spread, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles; no cheese or customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and modifications; values based on standard menu. Check In-N-Out app or site for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One standard In-N-Out burger provides ~390 kcal and ~16 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with menu info.

faqs.q: How many calories in a standard In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: About 390 kcal for the basic hamburger.

faqs.q: What are the macros for In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: â‰ˆ16 g protein, 19 g fat, 39 g carbs per burger.

faqs.q: Does In-N-Out burger have trans fats?
faqs.a: Yes, about 0.5 g trans fat per standard burger from the beef and spread.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Roughly 730 mg, mostly from the spread and bun.

faqs.q: Are calories different for cheeseburger vs. hamburger?
faqs.a: Yes, cheeseburger adds ~50 kcal, totaling around 480 kcal.
